title: Ep. 132: Consider Children's Literature
description:
Why you might consider reading children’s literature, how to reinvigorate your work space if you can’t make any changes, and the question of whether you can change your Tendency. Get in touch: @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft; podcast@gretchenrubin.com;
happiercast.com/132; 774-277- 9336.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
